name: Pon (ZebraArts)
description:
Pon is a Puzzle/Action game in a hexagonal 3d world.

QWE ASD move player
SPACE change active player (it works only in some levels)
K or CTRL rotate track
P or ESC pause

This game use cookies to save the current level
If it doesn’t run smoothly, you can change the graphics quality by clicking Settings in the main menu.

Any feedback is really appreciated.
